rdf:Description.dc:title: My Experiences in Manipur and the Naga Hills
rdf:Description.dc:creator: James Johnstone (1841–1895)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org. rdf:Description.dc:subject: Manipur (India)
rdf:Description.dc:description: A straightforward report of an English officer’s doings in Eastern India on the border with Burma in what was then known as The Naga Hills and Manipur.
